DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , placebo-controlled , double-blind clinical trial carry . Seventy-two patient chronic pain neck shoulder recruit randomized two group ( n = 36 group ) , one group receive active PBMT another group receive placebo PBMT ( device appearance actual laser , include visible light ) . Patients treat 9 different site 3 zone neck shoulder area , twice week 3 consecutive week PBMT device manufacture Multi Radiance Medical™ ( Solon - OH , USA ) . Primary outcome intensity pain use Visual Analog Pain Scale ( VAS ) , secondary outcome range motion ( ROM ) neck shoulder patient satisfaction therapy employ .
